short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free add-on for ChatGPT to help you add content from any website to your ChatGPT conversations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted ChatGPT to draft an email to someone based on their LinkedIn profile and recent tweets? Or write an inspiring essay using content from a Wikipedia page? Or start a discussion with ChatGPT about a blog post or academic paper?

TabJam is a free 3rd party add-on for ChatGPT that equips ChatGPT with new features, including:

üöÄ Simply @mention any of the tabs that are open in your browser, and TabJam will pull their content into your ChatGPT message.
üöÄ While viewing any web page, just press [Cmd ‚åò]+J or [Ctrl]+M to start a new chat involving the content of that page.

‚ú® Here are a few examples of what you can do with TabJam ‚ú®

‚úÖ Draft an email to a LinkedIn profile expressing interest in a job described on a company's careers page.
‚úÖ Summarize a Wikipedia article in 5 bullet-points.
‚úÖ Brainstorm solutions to problems mentioned in your Google Doc.
‚úÖ Get ideas for witty or funny one-liners you can post alongside links you share on social media.
‚úÖ Extract the session titles and speakers from a conference website into a table.
‚úÖ Write a reply to the tweet.
‚úÖ Rewrite the marketing copy for your company's or your product's home page.
‚úÖ Compare the specs of two products.
‚úÖ What are the top restaurants in a city according to a TripAdvisor thread.


üõ†Ô∏è How does it work üõ†Ô∏è

There are two ways to use TabJam.

Approach 1 - Start inside ChatGPT:

1Ô∏è‚É£ To mention a tab, start typing @ to bring up a list of tabs open in your browser.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Continue typing to find the tab you want to mention.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Press ‚èé to select the tab and mention it.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Once the tab is mentioned, its content will be included in your ChatGPT message.

Approach 2 - Start on a tab that you want to bring into a conversation:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Start on a web page that you want to start a ChatGPT conversation about.
2Ô∏è‚É£ If there is specific content on the page you want to focus on, drag to select the text and move on to step 3. If you instead want to include all of the content on the web page, ignore this step and move on to step 3.
3Ô∏è‚É£ [Cmd ‚åò]+J if you are on a Mac.
     Or press [Ctrl]+M if you are on Windows.



Disclaimer: TabJam for ChatGPT was neither created by nor is endorsed by OpenAI, the creators of ChatGPT. We are a team who created this extension because we wanted these missing capabilities in ChatGPT ourselves. We are making this extension available to the public because we believe that many other people can benefit from it.
